row.process:
! Check EC2_HOME environment variable if [ -z "$EC2_HOME" ]; then echo Environment variable EC2_HOME is not defined. This environment variable needed for EC2 API tools e.g /home/utils/ec2-api-tools-1.7.5.1 echo Exiting now.. exit 1 fi
! Check JAVA_HOME environment variable if [ -z "$JAVA_HOME" ]; then echo Environment variable JAVA_HOME is not defined. This environment variable is needed for EC2 API Tools. echo Exiting now.. exit 1 fi
